mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY NOTICE_INDEX DESC) RNUM, NOTICE_INDEX, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_ORIGINAL, NOTICE_NEW_IMG, NOTICE_FILE_SIZE, NOTICE_TIME, NOTICE_KATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY NOTICE_INDEX DESC) RNUM, NOTICE_INDEX, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_ORIGINAL, NOTICE_NEW_IMG, NOTICE_FILE_SIZE, NOTICE_TIME, NOTICE_KATE FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_KATE = 'G')
